jobDescription: Title: Data Analyst IIILocation: Chicago, ILDuration: 5+ MonthsOverview of daily responsibilities: The data analyst will be responsible for working with the Enterprise Data Management and business teams to facilitate scoping new data-focused projects including creating data catalog, data management requirements documentation, current and future state data architecture diagrams, as well as providing thought leadership in data architecture discussions, capturing meeting notes and translating discussions into firm technical requirements. Specific project details: The analyst will manage projects related to HR data and Customer Service Delivery – irregular operations reporting, catering, in-flight, airport operations and additional data projects as it relates to customer travel experience. Years of experience: 3-5 years’ work experience in data management and data architecture, and advanced SQL expertise. Experience with Big Data technologies (Hadoop) and/or analytics & statistical tools is a plus. Education requirements: Bachelor’s degree at a minimum
